treatment.description: Shrubs or trees, 1–5 m. Buds caprea-type. Leaves: stipules on late ones foliaceous; largest medial blade 1–3 times as long as wide, adaxial surface not glaucous. Staminate flowers: filaments glabrous or hairy basally. Pistillate flowers: adaxial nectary shorter than stipe; stipe 0.8–3.5 mm; ovary glabrous or pubescent; stigmas broadly cylindrical, 0.3–0.6 mm.
